links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=0,...,1000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 100); t=1/log(2); for (n=0, 1000, if (n==0, a=0, a=floor(3^(log(n)*t) + 0.0000001)); write("b060419.txt", n, " ", a); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 04 2009]
crossrefs: Cf. A006046 which shares the property that a(2^k)=3^k.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 05 2001
